001package org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.pojo;
002
003import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonCreator;
004import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonProperty;
005import org.bitcoinj.base.Address;
006import org.bitcoinj.base.Coin;
007import org.bitcoinj.base.Sha256Hash;
008
009import java.util.List;
010
011/**
012 *
013 */
014public class ReceivedByAddressInfo {
015    public final Address address;
016    public final Coin amount;
017    public final int confirmations;
018    public final List<Sha256Hash> txids;
019    public final String label;
020
021    @JsonCreator
022    public ReceivedByAddressInfo(@JsonProperty("address") Address address,
023                                 @JsonProperty("amount") Coin amount,
024                                 @JsonProperty("confirmations") int confirmations,
025                                 @JsonProperty("txids") List<Sha256Hash> txids,
026                                 @JsonProperty("label") String label) {
027        this.address = address;
028        this.amount = amount;
029        this.confirmations = confirmations;
030        this.txids = txids;
031        this.label = label;
032    }
033
034    public Address getAddress() {
035        return address;
036    }
037
038    public Coin getAmount() {
039        return amount;
040    }
041
042    public int getConfirmations() {
043        return confirmations;
044    }
045
046    public List<Sha256Hash> getTxids() {
047        return txids;
048    }
049}
